snippet.title: BURN - Steam Launch. Out Now.
snippet.description:
𝕭𝖀𝕽𝕹 is a short and replayable visual novel, where you play Nina BURN, the biggest pop star in the world at the turning point of her career. Will you change pop music? Will you become a monster? 𝖄𝖔𝖚 𝖜𝖎𝖑𝖑 𝕭𝖀𝕽𝕹.

𝕭𝖀𝕽𝕹 is a story game everyone can finish at least once as the first ending arrives in 15 minutes and it is Convict Games’ most interactive story to date out now on Steam.

BUY OR WISHLIST 𝕭𝖀𝕽𝕹 NOW: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1534660/BURN/

More Info & Merchandise: 
www.convictgames.com/burn

FOLLOW US:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/convictgames
Twitter:  https://twitter.com/convictgames
Instagram:https://instagram.com/convictgames
